text: Atahpara allaha yake patha-pradarsana karate cana, tara baksake isalamera jan'ye um'mukta kare dena ebam yake bipathagami karate cana, tara baksake sankirna atyadhika sankirna kare dena-yena se sabege akase arohana karache. Emani bhabe yara bisbasa sthapana kare na. Allaha tadera upara ayaba barsana karena.
